snippet: In the latest installment of the Source, a series of conversations on the roots of creativity, the artist Doug Aitken interviews the late architect Paolo Soleri, who talks about the importance of the unknowable.
abstract: In the latest installment of the Source, a series of conversations on the roots of creativity, the artist Doug Aitken interviews the late architect Paolo Soleri, who talks about the importance of the unknowable.

headline.main: The Source | Paolo Soleri in Conversation With Doug Aitken
